member.name: T:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl
member.summary: ZoomControl lets users zoom and pan a target component interactively.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ZoomControl class.

member.summary: Control.OnMouseDown override.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.SetZoomFactor(System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the current zoom level.
member.param: A float value specifying the new zoom level.
true to apply min/max constraints and align to ZoomStep, or false otherwise.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.components
member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.MinZoomFactor
member.summary: The minimum zoom level allowed to set through this control.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.MaxZoomFactor
member.summary: The maximum zoom level allowed to set through this control.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.ZoomFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the current zoom level.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.ZoomStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount by which to change zoom level when + and - buttons are clicked.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.ScrollStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the scroll offset added when users click the pan arrows.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.Fill
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush used to fill the ZoomControl elements.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.ActiveColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to render depressed buttons.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of ZoomControl elements' borders.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.InnerColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of plus, minus and arrow icons.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.ShadowColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the shadow color.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.CornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the corner radius of rounded child elements.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.SnapToZoomStep
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the trackbar should snap to ZoomStep values when dragged.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.TickPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the current tick position of the trackbar.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.ShowLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the label that shows the current zoom level should be visible.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.LabelFill
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush of the the label that shows the current zoom level.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets the target view controlled by this ZoomControl.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.ZoomFactorChanged
member.summary: Raised when the zoom level changes.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ZoomControl.ScrollArrowClicked
member.summary: Raised when a scroll arrow has been clicked.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ScrollDirection
member.summary: Identifies the direction of a scroll arrow.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ScrollDirection.Left
member.summary: Scroll to the left.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ScrollDirection.Top
member.summary: Scroll to the top.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ScrollDirection.Right
member.summary: Scroll to the right.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ScrollDirection.Bottom
member.summary: Scroll to the bottom.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.TickPosition
member.summary: Specifies the position of trackbar ticks.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.TickPosition.Left
member.summary: Ticks are rendered on the left side of the trackbar.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.TickPosition.Right
member.summary: Ticks are rendered on the right side of the trackbar.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.TickPosition.Both
member.summary: Ticks are rendered on both sides of the trackbar.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.TickPosition.None
member.summary: There are no ticks rendered.

member.summary: Contains arguments for the ScrollArrowClicked event.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ScrollArrowEventArgs class.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.ScrollArrowEventArgs.Direction
member.summary: Specifies which arrow button has been clicked.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.IZoomTarget
member.summary: Specifies the capabilities required by ZoomControl from its target controls.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.IZoomTarget.SetZoomLevel(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets a new zoom level.
member.param: A float value specifying the zoom level.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.IZoomTarget.GetZoomLevel
member.summary: Gets the current zoom level.
member.returns: A float value specifying the zoom level.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.IZoomTarget.SetScrollX(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the horizontal scroll position.
member.param: A float value specifying the horizontal scroll position.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.IZoomTarget.GetScrollX
member.summary: Gets the horizontal scroll position.
member.returns: A float value specifying the horizontal scroll position.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.IZoomTarget.SetScrollY(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the vertical scroll position.
member.param: A float value specifying the vertical scroll position.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.IZoomTarget.GetScrollY
member.summary: Gets the vertical scroll position.
member.returns: A float value specifying the vertical scroll position.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.IZoomTarget.ZoomLevelChanged
member.summary: Raised to notify that the target's zoom level has changed.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.IZoomTarget.ViewChanged
member.summary: Raised to notify that the target view has changed.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WinForms.IZoomTarget.IsDrawing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the zoom target is currently being painted by the zoom control.
